text: Club de Deportes Cobreloa is a Chilean football club from the Calama. It is one of the country's most competitive clubs. ==Honours== ===National honours=== *Primera Divisi√≥n: 8 ::1980, 1982, 1985, 1988, 1992, 2003-A, 2003-C, 2004-C *Copa Chile: 1 ::1986 ===International honours=== *Copa Libertadores: 0 ::Runners-up (2): 1981, 1982 Category:Chilean football clubs Category:1977 establishments Category:20th-century establishments in Chile Category:1970s establishments in South America
title: Cobreloa
